snippet: At least 12 people were killed in a car bombing in the capital of Yemen on Tuesday, in what appeared to be an attack targeting the country's defense minister.
abstract: At least 12 people were killed in a car bombing in the capital of Yemen on Tuesday, in what appeared to be an attack targeting the country's defense minister.

headline.main: After Militant Is Killed, Car Bomb Targets Yemen Minister
